ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: You should try getting a party together to travel with you outside the greater faydark area.  I don t know the area at all, so I can t offer advise on where to
ygData.messageBody:
You should try getting a party together to travel with you outside the greater faydark area. I don't know the area at all, so I can't offer advise on where to go, but always remember there is safety in numbers. Especially for a wizard. Hope this helps..

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard
-----Original Message-----
From: Empress <empress@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, April 18, 1999 10:25 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] (no subject)


hey everyone, i'm a level five high elf, and i'm really scared to leave the greater faydark, everytime i do, i get killed by something, but everthing where i'm fighting is green now!! All those stupid skeletons and rats and those big bees all team up on me, what should i do?
